Define class ToolStructure with attribute(s) and method(s). Generating tool directory structure.
class gen_py_tool.tool.tool_structure.ToolStructure[source]¶

Bases: object

Define class ToolStructure with attribute(s) and method(s). Generating tool directory structure. It defines:

attributes:
__slots__ - Setting class slots
VERBOSE - Console text indicator for current process-phase
__RUN - 0 Run directory
__CFG - 1 Configuration directory
__LOG - 2 Logging directory
__TOOL_SUB_STRUCTURE - Dictionary structure
methods:
gen_structure - Generating tool directory structure
VERBOSE = 'GEN_PY_TOOL::TOOL::TOOL_STRUCTURE'¶
classmethod gen_structure(project_name, verbose=False)[source]¶

Generating tool directory structure.

Parameters:
  • project_name (<str>) – Project root directory name
  • verbose (<bool>) – Enable/disable verbose option
Returns:

Boolean status (structure generated) True, else False
Return type:

<bool>
Exceptions:

ATSBadCallError | ATSTypeError
